Merry Christmas to me! üéÖüéÑ I finally developed a working RCE exploit for CVE-2018-17463! ü•≥ I'll be sharing details on how this was achieved in the 3rd and final part of my browser exploitation series on Chrome. Keep an eye out for the update! https://t.co/3zuulNher4

CVE-2022-42046 is now published.

wfshbr64.sys and wfshbr32.sys are vulnerable to local privilege escalation through intentional manipulation of kernel objects using a specially crafted IOCTL.

Co-Authored @DoranekoSystems
